name: ai-code-studio
description: AI-powered code generation and execution notebook with multi-language support

scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run optimize
scripts.build:enhanced: npm run copy-enhanced && npm run optimize
scripts.build:fixed: npm run copy-fixed && npm run optimize
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && cp index.html dist/
scripts.copy-enhanced: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && cp enhanced-index.html dist/index.html
scripts.copy-fixed: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && cp fixed-index.html dist/index.html && cp src/styles/fixed-artifacts.css dist/styles/
scripts.build:working: npm run copy-working && npm run optimize
scripts.build:full: npm run copy-full && npm run optimize
scripts.copy-full: mkdir -p dist && cp full-ai-notebook.html dist/index.html && cp code-executor.py dist/
scripts.build:mobile: npm run copy-mobile && npm run optimize
scripts.copy-mobile: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp code-executor.py dist/ && cp claude-cli-bridge.js dist/

author: Jupyter AI Team
